titleStmt.title: SII 13.73: original edition by G.V. Srinivasa Rao
No. 73. (A.R. No. 116 of 1926.) TIRUVIḶAKKUḌI, MAYAVARAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CENTRAL SHRINE, MAṆAVĀḶĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This records an endowment of two pieces of land and a house-site by the sabhā of Murugavēḷ-maṅgalam, a brahmadēya in Kurukkai-nāḍu on the north bank, for the maintenance of three persons sounding the kāḷam and gong during the śrībali service in the temple of Mahādēvar Maṅgala-Nakkar in the village. One of these lands and the house are said to have belonged to two brothers and, after their demise without issue, to have gone under the ward of the assembly.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kovirājakesaripanmaṟkku yāṇṭu 3Āvatu vaṭa
karai kkuṟukkaināṭṭu brahmadeyam murukaveḷmaṅ
kalattu sabhayom Ivūr mahādevar maṅkala nakkarkku
śrīpali koṭṭik kāḷamūta Iraṇṭāḷukkum cekaṇṭikai
koṭṭa Orāḷukkum nivantam ceytu kuṭutta nilamāvatu Ūriṉ
kiḻurkaraiyeḻumāveṉṟu perkūvappaṭum nilamāva
tuk kellaiy kiḻpāṟkellai Ivuvaccarkaḷ nilam ceṅkuṭṭi
kku meṟkkum tenpāṟkellai devar Arccaṉābhogattukku vaṭakkum
melpāṟkellai vaṭakkuṉokkip pona vāykkālukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapā
ṟkellai paḻaṅkāṭiyār vāykkālukku teṟkkum Inṉālellaiyilum makap
paṭṭa nilamum Ivvūr tenmaṅkala vitit teruvukku meṟkkum Illa maṉaiyum
Ivvūr pāratāyan caṅkara nārāyaṇaṉum Ivan tampi caṅ
karaṉ veṅkaṭayaṉum Ivarkaḷ kaḻintu Ivarkaḷukku santatiyum Iṉṟi ce
ṟu kāṇiyāy sabhai ṉokkāna Ivilla maṉaikkum toṭṭattukkum Ellai kiḻpāṟ
kellaiy maṇiyaṅ kūṭattār maṉaikkum kavaṇiyaṉ kāḷi tāmotiraṉum kāḷi veṅkaṭamum pā
(ā)ratāyan kaṇṭan kāṭaṉum toṭṭattukkum meṟkkum teṉpāṟ kellai kavici nakka rumā
lum tampimārum pāratāyan kāḷi nakkaṉum tampimārum nilattukku vaṭakkum melpāṟ kellai
madhyasthaṉ Alaṅkārapiriyaṉum tampimārum toṭṭattukkum Illattukkum kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟke
llai teruvukku teṟkkum Ivicaitta nāṉkellaiyilum Akappaṭṭa nilattuk kiḻakkaṭaiya Il
yum toṭṭamum Uvaccarkku Illayaṉa nikki kki niṉṟa Uḷppaṭṭa toṭṭa meṟkkaṭaiya toṭṭa
m Orumā varaikkāṇi nilamum Ivūr pātacivan tirutti tiruvic rkkum kkum Urittāka I
m muṉṟāḷukku coṟṟukkum puṭavaiy mutalukkum cantirātittaval mu ḷuvum paṇi ceytu Uṇṇap pe
ṟuvārkaḷāka nivantam ceytu kuṭuttom murukaveḷmaṅkalattu sabhaiyom sabhai paṇikka
veḻutine nivūr madhyasthaṉ nayamāna nakkan Alaṅkārapriyaneṉ Icceyum Itukkup pāyum caṇ
ṭeśvara vāyikkālum Iṟaiyili pa(nṉ)nmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 13.73 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
